resources.string: All of this will remove the sata data (including the partition)!
Please input the partition size (in MB)

"
" " Attention:To make sure your SATA was connected before U flash disk.""
" " Formatting your sata and recognition by root explorer.""
" " 1.Click ''Format SATA (exfat)'', wait several seconds, it will point to you the succeed dialog,then booting the system.""
" "
" " How to boot from SATA?""
" " 1.Click ''Format SATA (ext4)'' to clean and format the sata.""
" " 2.Click ''SATA partition'' to partition for your EX4 file system.""
" " 3.Android file system default was set on the first partition, please set more than 600M for the first partition.""
" " 4.Click ''Copy file system to SATA'' to make the file system of board copy into SATA.""
" " 5.Choose system booting way ''Boot from SATA'' booting from sata, ''Boot from NAND'' booting from nand."
